verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday night] [V: made] [ARG1: an eyebrow - raising claim on Twitter] : The FBI 's investigation into the Trump campaign began in December 2015 , he said -- not July 2016 , as former FBI Director James Comey had testified under oath .

President Donald Trump on Tuesday night made an [ARGM-MNR: eyebrow] - [V: raising] [ARG0: claim] on Twitter : The FBI 's investigation into the Trump campaign began in December 2015 , he said -- not July 2016 , as former FBI Director James Comey had testified under oath .
